whoAmI.title: Who Am I
whoAmI.highSchool: Since 2013, I started working on Video Production. Being Obsessed with providing gorgeous video effects and significant thoughts to my schoolmates.
whoAmI.college: During my college life, I joined Unique Studio. My work has changed from Visual Design to Product Management. Dozens of technologies and approaches had been tried to enrich my horizons.
whoAmI.showWorksDescription: With my pleasure, here are some of my works:
workList: A Tool Present Relationships in Unique Studio
whoAmI.besides: Besides that, I have been maintaining some infrastructure for my collaborators.

block.title: Introduction
block.content:
UnionSQL provides a unified data query service for millet products, operations, R&D, sales, etc, and empowers the company's core business. It can replace the existing job scheduling platform in the context of interactive query, providing a more convenient and convenient data query entry.


I mainly responsible for the interactive query during the internship.

photo.title: Photo
photo.description:
To see the world, things dangerous to come to,

to see behind walls, to draw closer,

to find each other, and to feel.

That is the purpose of life.
